title: [Large-Scale] Reading Software Evaluation Framework Design and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and scientific reading comprehension skills
context.additional_context: A course enhancing reading software evaluation capabilities in science fields for application in research and job performance

learning_goals: Specifically explain the three core elements of research-based evaluation frameworks (interface design, instructional design, reading content).
Systematically analyze science domain reading software according to evaluation frameworks.
Write project-based software evaluation reports and propose practical improvement strategies.

resources: LMS, assessment framework templates, sample software (3 types), peer evaluation rubrics

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
